name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Software Engineer with 8 years of experience, I specialize in **Full-stack Development** utilizing **React**, **TypeScript**, and **Python** to drive high-performance solutions within the healthcare and financial sectors. My extensive expertise includes working with **GraphQL**, **MySQL**, **Redis**, and **Memcached**, complemented by my ability to create seamless **User Experiences**. I have a proven track record in leading teams and fostering collaboration, thereby enhancing productivity and achieving project goals.

Throughout my career, I've developed enterprise-grade platforms that integrate AI/ML capabilities and adhere to compliance standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. My work is backed by a solid foundation in modern frameworks such as **Next.js**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**, as well as cloud services like **Azure** and **AWS**. Additionally, I have hands-on experience in building machine learning pipelines and implementing MLOps workflows using tools like MLflow and Airflow. My technical prowess, combined with my leadership skills and a strong focus on delivering innovative solutions, positions me as a valuable asset to any development team.
